rules_text:
When Olten Surveyor enters, choose any number. Each opponent creates a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token for each mode chosen.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less.
• Shuffle up to four cards from target player's graveyard into their library.
• You gain 4 life.
flavor_text: [i]“Got a weird thing to show you.”[/i]
